1.Who was the first Indian women in Space?

Convent of Jesus & Mary High School & Junior College
 Plot No. 13 & 14
 Sector 6
 Kharghar
 Navi Mumbai 410 210
 Maharashtra
Q. How do I let others know about this app?
A. The app is available for free download on the Google Play Store. You can go to the Google play store from your mobile, and in the search area enter St. Mary\'s School (ICSE)
Q. How do I get access to the secure areas of the app?

A. To get access to the secure areas of the app, you will need to be registered with the school as a student, parent or alumni. Please email info@stmarysicse.com and we will request the school to provide the information.
Q. It is taking a long time to download?

A. Download times will vary based on your connection, with wifi being the fastest, followed by 3G, Edge and 2G. For better speeds, the coverage of the network will need to be improved and you will need to move to a location with a better coverage.
Q. What versions does this app support?
A. This app support Android version 4.0 and above.
Q. Will it work on a tablet?
A. This app is designed to work with all devices
Q. How do I turn off notifications?
A. Notifications on/off button is provided for different types. Please turn on/off those notifications that you would like.

A. Registration can only be done via the school physical registration form. It requires a few details especially the phone number. Once the app is launched, Click the “Login” icon. It will take you to a login screen. Click “New User”. It will then ask for your mobile number and you have to click on register button.You will receive a six digit password via sms which needs to be entered to login. It is a one time registration and will be remembered by the app.
Q. What is the recommended data connection? 2G, 3G or WiFi?
A. Charcha requires a data connection similar to other popular apps that use data services. We recommend a 3G connection or WiFi of 256kB or faster.
Q. Is my mobile number visible? Who has access to that information?
A. Your mobile number is not visible to any other person in the group including the teacher. Only the school administrative authority has access to that information..
Q. Will I receive marketing messages from the school or its partners?
A. None of the information provided for purposes of the app has been disclosed to tele-marketers or other agents. If this changes in the future, you will be notified prior to such change.
Q. I deleted the password, what do I do?

A. The school has designated that the app will resend your password twice in 1 academic year. You can click on the “Forgot Password” link , enter your mobile number and the password will be resent to your registered mobile number via sms. You may use this to log in again.
Q. How often can I “resend” password?

A. The school has designated that the app will resend your password twice in 1 academic year. If you need it to be issued again, you will need to visit the school office and request this information for a fee of Rs10.
Q. I cleared the cache on my phone and now I cannot log in to Charcha. How do I login now?
A. You can use the same sms that was first sent to you via sms on registration in Charcha. If you have lost that password, then you may use the “Forgot Password” option as above.
Q. Does my mobile screen size make a difference?
A. The app takes into account various screen sizes. The screen size doesn’t impact the app performance.
Q. How to get additional information?
A. Please visit: http://intellinects.com/engage/mobile-app/ for more details.
Q. How do I get access to the secure areas of the app?

A. To get access to the secure areas of the app, you will need to be registered with the school as a student, parent or alumni. Please email info@stmarysicse.com and we will request the school to provide the information.
Q. Does Charcha work on all phones?

A. Charcha works on all Android phones with an OS of 4.0 or later. These include phones from manufacturers like Alcatel, Asus, Celkon, Gionee, Huawei, HTC, Karbonn, Lava, Lenovo, LG, Max, Micromax, Motorola, Oppo, Panasonic, Samsung, Sansui, Sony, Videocon and Xolo.
Q. What if don’t have an android phone? What about feature phones and iPhones?

A. In order to provide parents with the information from the Charcha classrooms, we have made a provision for you to receive the Charcha chat room information via email if you do not have an android phone. You will be emailed the room discussion along with attachments once a day per the time schedule provided by the school. Kindly ensure that you have provided an accurate email address to the school via the app registration form.

A. Registration can only be done via the school physical registration form. It requires a few details especially the phone number. Once the app is launched, Click the “Login” icon. It will take you to a login screen. Click “New User”. It will then ask for your mobile number and you have to click on register button.You will receive a six digit password via sms which needs to be entered on the LOGIN screen along with the mobile number. It is a one time registration and will be remembered by the app.
Q. What is the recommended data connection? 2G, 3G or WiFi?
A. Charcha requires a data connection similar to other popular apps that use data services. We recommend a 3G connection or WiFi of 256kB or faster.
Q. Is my mobile number visible? Who has access to that information?
A. Your mobile number is not visible to any other person in the group including the teacher. Only the school administrative authority has access to that information.
Q. Will I receive marketing messages from the school or its partners?
A. None of the information provided for purposes of the app has been disclosed to tele-marketers or other agents. If this changes in the future, you will be notified prior to such change.
A. Charcha is being launched with only teachers and school administration having the permission to post data to a particular classroom. In the future, bi-directional messaging may be provided.
Q. How many devices can I register Charcha on?

A. Charcha can only be used on 2 devices. One of these devices is your primary device whose SIM will be authenticated. The secondary device doesn’t necessarily require a SIM (it can be a tab etc. without 2G/3G and only WiFi). You need to register each device separately. Password of one device cannot be used in any other device. You can only be logged in to one room from one device at a time.
Q. Where are the Charcha images and videos stored on my phone? Can I see them after I have exited the school app?
A. Images are stored in a folder with the same name as the School App. It can be access via the Gallery or file manager.
Q. How do I clear the data, text, images and videos for the Charcha rooms?

A. For Android devices, click on the “Menu” button. Depending on the brand of your device, it could be either the left of the right button on the bottom of your phone. When you click on this, you will see the option to “Clear Logs” . Select this option. You may also clear images through the Image Gallery or File Manager of your smart phone.
Q. Can I get an email with the Charcha content?
A. This feature is under development. Kindly make sure you have provided an accurate email address to the school so that you will be notified when this is made available.
Q. How do I know I am in the right classroom?
A. You will be assigned classrooms based on the class and division in which your child/children are enrolled.
Q. What happens if I am assigned the wrong classroom/s?

A. Please email your queries to charcha@intellinects.org. Kindly specify the following:
 (i) Your school your child attends
 (ii) Your child’s class and division and GR number
 (iii) Your name and mobile phone number
 We will rectify the issue after confirmation from the school.
Q. I deleted the password, what do I do?

A. The school has designated that the app will resend your password twice in 1 academic year. You can click on the “Forgot Password” link, enter your mobile number and the password will be resent to your registered mobile number via sms. You may use this to login again.
Q. How often can I “resend” password?

A. The school has designated that the app will resend your password twice in 1 academic year. If you need it to be issued again, you will need to visit the school office and request this information for a fee of Rs10.
Q. I cleared the cache on my phone and now I cannot log in to Charcha. How do I login now?
A. You can use the same sms that was first sent to you via sms on registration in Charcha. If you have lost that password, then you may use the “Forgot Password” option as above.
Q. Does my mobile screen size make a difference?
A. The app takes into account various screen sizes. The screen size doesn’t impact the app performance.
Q. Image compression (quality of image linked to mobile camera etc.)
A. We recommend a phone with camera capability of at least 2 Mpixel resolution for photographing homework, blackboard notes and other images.
A. At present you may share photographs, images, and audio files (these need to be previously recorded). Videos can be shared as a link. There is currently no provision to record and upload a video.
Q. Will school timetables be posted on Charcha?
A. The school calendar is included in the basic app. Examination timetables and formative evaluations are either posted as news items and could also be included in the Charcha classrooms.
Q. Can I opt out and then opt in?

A. The process to opt in is per registration as specified in the General FAQ section above. If you haven’t opted in, then you are not enrolled in Charcha. After you are registered user, you may discontinue receiving messages for Charcha by logging out. You may do this by clicking on the Charcha screen and selecting logout
Q. Only 1 classroom is visible, but I have 2 or more children in the same school in different classes

A. Please email this information to charcha@intellinects.org. Kindly specify the following:
 (i) Your school your children attends
 (ii) For each child, their class and divisions and GR numbers
 (iii) Your name and mobile phone number
 We will rectify the issue after confirmation from the school.
Q. How to reach the school with other issues?

A. Please visit http://intellinects.com/contact/faq/#tab-1419652064283-7-6for further details on Chracha. You may also email your queries to charcha@intellinects.org. Kindly specify the following:
 (i) Your school your child attends
 (ii) Your child’s class and division and GR number
 (iii) Your name and mobile phone number
 (iv) Brief description of the issue your are facing.
 We will respond within 24 – 48 hours.

You are responsible for regularly reviewing information posted online to obtain timely notice of such changes. Your continued use of the App after changes are posted constitutes your acceptance of the amended Terms of Use.

To download, install, access or use the App, you must be 13 years of age or over. If you are under 13 and you wish to use download, install, access or use the App, you must get consent from your parent or guardian before doing so.
We operate the software underlying and required for your use of the App from India and the app is governed by the laws of India.

Use of the App does not include the provision of a mobile device or other necessary equipment to access it. To use the App you will require Internet connectivity and appropriate telecommunication links. We shall not have any responsibility or liability for any telephone or other costs you may incur.
You shall not in any way use the App or submit to us or to the App or to any user of the App anything which in any respect:
is in breach of any law, statute, regulation or byelaw of any applicable jurisdiction;

may be obscene, indecent, pornographic, vulgar, profane, racist, sexist, discriminatory, offensive, derogatory, harmful, harassing, threatening, embarrassing, malicious, abusive, hateful, menacing, defamatory, untrue or political;
impersonates any other person or body or misrepresents a relationship with any person or body;

may infringe or breach the copyright or any intellectual property rights (including without limitation copyright, trademark rights and broadcasting rights) or privacy or other rights of us or any third party;
may be contrary to our interests;
is contrary to any specific rule or requirement that we stipulate on the App in relation to a particular part of the App or the App generally; or

involves your use, delivery or transmission of any viruses, unsolicited emails, trojan horses, trap doors, back doors, easter eggs, worms, time bombs, cancelbots or computer programming routines that are intended to damage, detrimentally interfere with, surreptitiously intercept or expropriate any system, data or personal information.

You assume sole responsibility for results obtained from the use of the App, and for conclusions drawn from such use. \ Sudoku is a logic-based number placement puzzle. Starting with a partially completed 9x9 grid, the objective is to fill the grid so that each row, each column, and each of the 3x3 boxes (also called blocks) contains the digits 1 to 9 exactly once.
